mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PY_PCR_CRS_CRT_BDI_LIS_ACI( UUID, CRT_TIME, CRT_USER, TRN_ID, LAST_PAYMENT_MONTH, REMAIN_TERMS, BALANCE_LAST_TERM, RPA_LAST_TERM, AA_LAST_TERM, ARREAR_TIMES_COUNT, ATCO_CONTINUOUS, ATCO_TOTAL, ARREAR_TIMES1, ARREAR_TIMES2, ARREAR_TIMES3, ARREAR_TIMES4, ARREAR_TIMES5, ARREAR_TIMES6, ARREAR_TIMES7_12, ARREAR_TIMES_OVER12, INFO_DATE, APP_ID ) VALUES( sys_guid(), sysdate, #{crtUser}, #{trnId}, #{lastPaymentMonth}, #{remainTerms}, #{balanceLastTerm}, #{rpaLastTerm}, #{aaLastTerm}, #{arrearTimesCount}, #{atcoCountinuous}, #{atcoTotal}, #{arrearTimes1}, #{arrearTimes2}, #{arrearTimes3}, #{arrearTimes4}, #{arrearTimes5}, #{arrearTimes6}, #{arrearTimes7_12}, #{arrearTimesOver12}, #{infoDate}, #{appId} )
